summary: FAULTY ENGINE SENSORS CAUSES THE CAR STALL AT ANYTIME.    WAS DRIVING WHEN STOPPED AT A RED LIGHT MY CAR STALLED AND THE DASHBOARD LIGHT UP ALONG WITH MULTIPLE ERROR MESSAGES. IT TOOK 15 TIMES FOR MY CAR TO RESTART.  THIS ISSUE IS A COMPLETELY UNSAFE AND PUTTING THE DRIVER AND PASSENGERS AT GREAT RISK.      CURRENTLY MY CAR IS IN THE SHOP BUT HAVE READ SIMILAR STORIES ONLINE SAYING THAT THIS PARTICULAR PROBLEM IS ASSOCIATED WITH A TRANSMISSION ISSUE. MANY STATED THIS IS KNOWN ISSUE AT CHRYSLER WHICH THEY HAVE DONE NOTHING TO ACTION THE CONSUMER.
